common.saveSuccess: Message sent! We will get back to you soon.

landing.title: TRANSIT MADE
landing.subtitle: Empowering passengers with real-time schedules and direct driver communication. Experience the next generation of Lebanese transportation.

challenge.title: Frustrated with the
challenge.item1Desc: Standing for hours not knowing when the next bus or van will pass.
challenge.item2Desc: Traditional transit in Lebanon lacks established digital schedules.
challenge.item3Desc: No easy way to reach drivers directly to check availability.

systems.title: Old Systems Are Failing
systems.desc: Lebanon's transport infrastructure deserves more than just luck. It's time to bridge the gap between technology and the road.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.desc: Providing clear, real-time data for every route and scheduled time.

community.title: Community
community.desc: Building a trust-based ecosystem between drivers and their passengers.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.desc: Reducing wait times and optimizing fuel for drivers through better planning.

solution.title: Everything You Need To Travel Smarter

daycards.title: DayCards
daycards.desc: Drivers publish their daily availability and scheduled timers instantly.

chat.title: Direct Chat
chat.desc: One-click access to talk with your driver via WhatsApp for quick coordination.

verified.title: Verified Drivers
verified.desc: Each driver on our platform is vetted for safety and professional reliability.

cta.desc: Whether you're a driver looking to reach more passengers or a passenger seeking a reliable schedule, TransLeb is built for you.

about.title: Changing the way
about.quote: "A premium network connecting Lebanon, one ride at a time. Built with passion, safety, and reliability at its core."

whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.p1: TransLeb is a dedicated platform designed to revolutionize the transportation sector in Lebanon. We recognized the challenges faced by both drivers and passengers in the current landscape—unreliable schedules, safety concerns, and lack of coordination.
whoWeAre.p2: We are a team of passionate Lebanese individuals who believe that technology can solve local problems. By creating a centralized hub for verified drivers and daily commuters, we're not just providing a service; we're building a community.

builtForLebanon.title: Built for Lebanon
builtForLebanon.desc: Empowering our local economy and simplifying daily life.

ourGoal.title: Our Goal
ourGoal.mission: Our mission is to become the leading intelligence layer for transportation in the region, focusing on transparency and user-centric solutions.

community.title: Community Driven
community.desc: We bridge the gap between drivers and commuters across Lebanon, fostering a trust-based ecosystem.

security.title: Security First
security.desc: Every driver is verified, and every trip is monitored to ensure the highest safety standards.

tech.title: Scaleable Tech
tech.desc: Built on modern architecture to provide real-time updates and seamless coordination.

contact.title: GET IN
contact.desc: Have questions or want to partner with us? We're always here to help and listen.

form.name: Full Name
form.subject: Subject
form.placeholderMessage: Tell us what's on your mind...

error.title: Error Loading Drivers
error.desc: We encountered a problem fetching our driver partners. Please check your connection and try again.

empty.title: No Match Found
empty.desc: We couldn't find any drivers matching

signin.title: Welcome back
signin.subtitle: Securely sign in to your TransLeb account

dashboard.subtitle: Manage your daily schedules and bus timers efficiently

empty.desc: You haven't created any day cards yet. Start by adding your first daily schedule.

timerDisplay.subtitle: Exact departure times for today
timerDisplay.notDecidedDesc: The driver is still planning the exact schedule. Check back soon!

passengerForm.subtitle: Please fill in your details to reserve a seat.
passengerForm.timeHint: * Enter your preferred time for pickup.
passengerForm.savedDesc: We've recorded your details. You can update them at any time before the trip.

notFound.title: Driver Not Found
notFound.desc: We couldn't find the driver profile you're looking for. It might have been deleted or the link is incorrect.

driverProfile.defaultDescription: Passionate about providing safe and timely transportation for all passengers. Always on schedule and ready to cover your daily needs across Lebanon regions.
driverProfile.schedulesSubtitle: Browse through all available schedules for this driver.
driverProfile.noSchedulesDesc: Try searching for a different date or check back later for new updates.

footer.slogan: "Connecting commuters and drivers across Lebanon with a premium, reliable, and secure transportation network."

pshareLocation.title: Share Your Location
pshareLocation.subtitle: Let the driver know where to pick you up

toast.sharedSuccess: Your location is shared with the driver
toast.driverMarked: A driver has marked your location! Timer extended.
toast.geoNotSupported: Geolocation not supported by this browser

guide.title: Quick Guide
guide.step1: Auto-locate your position or click the map.
guide.step2: Confirm the pin location is accurate.
guide.step3: Click "Share Live Location" for the driver.

pshareLocation.clickMapPin: Click on Map to Drop Pin
